chat_history.message:
Hello,
My product is an iPhone 13 with the above problem:
The speaker (earpiece) on the top of the front of the iPhone was defective from the beginning. Calling was only possible through the speaker, even when playing other tones, the upper speaker did not work. Additionally, navigating through Google Maps and Apple Maps was not really possible because the current location only updated every few minutes instead of constantly. I have tried all settings but nothing changed.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stocks available for an exchange. Instead we have fully refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
